entry.title: The Education (The London Institute) (Designated Staff) Order 1990
entry.summary: This Order designates, for the purposes of section 127 of the Education Reform Act 1988, five persons employed by the Inner London Education Authority (“ILEA”) to work partly at Furzedown Hostel and partly at other property of that authority.

entry.title: The Value Added Tax (Transport) Order 1990
The Value Added Tax (Tour Operators) (Amendment) Order 1990
The Value Added Tax (Charities) Order 1990
The Social Security (Claims and Payments) Amendment Regulations 1990
The Companies Act 1989 (Commencement No. 5 and Transitional and Saving Provisions) Order 1990
entry.summary: Article 3 of this Order brings into force on 31st May 1990:

entry.title: The Public Airport Companies (Capital Finance) Order 1990
The Highland Regional Council (Loch Lannsaidh) Water Order 1990
The Passenger Transport Executives (Capital Finance) Order 1990
entry.summary: Part IV of the Local Government and Housing Act 1989 establishes a framework of capital finance controls for local authorities in relation to the financial years starting on or after 1st April 1990. Section 39 enables these controls to be extended and adapted so as to take account of the capital finance transactions of bodies under local authority control. Among these bodies are the Passenger Transport Executives each of which is responsible under the Transport Act 1968 (c. 73) to the Passenger Transport Authority (“PTA”) for its area.

entry.title: The Public Trustee (Fees) (Amendment) Order 1990
Act of Adjournal (Consolidation Amendment No. 1) (Drug Trafficking) 1990

category.term: HIGH COURT OF JUSTICIARY, SCOTLAND;SUMMARY JURISDICTION, SCOTLAND

entry.title: The Financial Services Act 1986 (Listed Money Market Institutions and Miscellaneous Exemptions) Order 1990
entry.summary: Article 2 of this Order adds to the exemption provided by section 43 of and Schedule 5 to the Financial Services Act 1986 by providing that section 43 and Schedule 5 have effect as if certain instruments issued in the circumstances described in article 2 of the Order were amongst the instruments specified in paragraph 2(2) of Schedule 5. The Order also exempts the persons mentioned in article 3(1) from the requirement to obtain authorisation under the Financial Services Act in respect of any investment business they carry on and the persons mentioned in article 3(2) from that requirement to the extent specified in the article.

entry.title: The Traffic Signs (Amendment) Regulations 1990 and the Traffic Signs (Amendment) General Directions 1990
Act of Sederunt (Rules of the Court of Session Amendment No.2) (Solicitors' Fees) 1990
Act of Sederunt (Fees of Solicitors in the Sheriff Court) (Amendment) 1990
The Personal Community Charge (Qualifying Courses of Education) Regulations 1990
entry.summary: Under paragraph 6A of Schedule 1 to the Local Government Finance Act 1988 a person is exempt from the personal community charge if he is aged under 20, he is undertaking a qualifying course of education, and the course is not undertaken in consequence of an office or employment held by him.

entry.title: The Community Charges (Administration and Enforcement) (Amendment) Regulations 1990
The Highways (Road Humps) Regulations 1990
entry.summary: These regulations revoke the Highways (Road Humps) Regulations 1986 and replace them with new provisions.

entry.title: The Export of Goods (Control) (Amendment No. 2) Order 1990
entry.summary: This Order further amends the Export of Goods (Control) Order 1989.
